country.name: Argentina
country.description: Argentina is a country in southern South America. It ranks second in land area in South America, and eighth in the world.

country.name: Brazil
country.description: Brazil is the largest and most populous country in South America, and fifth largest in the world in both area and population.

country.name: Canada
country.description: Canada is the worlds second-largest country by total area, occupying most of northern North America.

country.name: Chile
country.description: Chile, officially the Republic of Chile, is a country in South America occupying a long and narrow coastal strip wedged between the Andes mountains and the Pacific Ocean.

country.name: Colombia
country.description: Colombia, or formally, the Republic of Colombia, is the northwesternmost country of South America.

country.name: England
country.description: England is a nation in northwest Europe, and the largest and most populous constituent country of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

country.name: EEUU
country.description: United States of America, also known as the United States, the U.S., the US , the U.S.A., the USA , the U.S. of A., The States, and America, is a country in North America that extends from the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean and shares land borders with Canada and Mexico.

country.name: France
country.description: France, is a country whose metropolitan territory is located in Western Europe and which also comprises various overseas islands and territories located in other continents.

country.name: Germany
country.description: Germany is a democratic parliamentary federal republic, made up of 16 states (Bundesl�nder), which in certain spheres act independently of the federation.

country.name: Italy
country.description: The Italian Republic is a country located in Southern Europe, that comprises the Po River valley, the Italian Peninsula and the two largest islands in the Mediterranean Sea, Sicily and Sardinia.

country.name: Jamaica
country.description: Jamaica is an island nation of the Greater Antilles, 240 kilometres (150 mi) in length and as much as 85 kilometres (50 mi) in width situated in the Caribbean Sea.

country.name: Netherlands
country.description: The Netherlands is the European part of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, which consists of the Netherlands, the Netherlands Antilles, and Aruba.

country.name: Peru
country.description: Peru, officially the Republic of Peru, is a country in western South America, bordering Ecuador and Colombia to the north, Brazil to the east, Bolivia to the south-east, Chile to the south, and the Pacific Ocean to the west.

country.name: Paraguay
country.description: Paraguay, officially the Republic of Paraguay, is a landlocked country in South America. It lies on both banks of the Paraguay River, bordering Argentina to the south and southwest, Brazil to the east and northeast, and Bolivia to the northwest, and is located in the very heart of South America.

country.name: Uruguay
country.description: Uruguay, officially the Eastern Republic of Uruguay or the Republic East of the Uruguay (River), is a nation located in southern part of South America.

country.name: Venezuela
country.description: Venezuela, officially the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, is a country on the northern coast of South America.

country.name: Spain
country.description: Spain, officially the Kingdom of Spain, is a country located in Southern Europe, with two small exclaves in North Africa (both bordering Morocco). Spain is a democracy which is organized as a parliamentary monarchy.
